title: GDTuber
short_description: A dynamic PNGTuber software made in Godot
description: A dynamic and open source PNGTuber software.
Developed by 11 contributors using the Godot engine.

title: Smart Thermostat
short_description: A smart thermostat run by a Raspberry Pi and ESP8266 microcontrollers
description: A smart thermostat run by a Raspberry Pi with ESP32 microcontrollers as wireless temperature sensors.
Remotely monitorable and controllable via a web interface.
Code structure and logic developed with Python and FastAPI.

title: Kitchen Shuffle
short_description: A chaotic card-based cooking created for Godot Wild Jam #80
description: You are the head chef at Glopmorn P. Peperoni's Kitchen. Customers are piling in and it's your job to serve them as quickly as possible. Drag cards around to cook their orders and serve them.
Created over 8 days in a team of 2 for Godot Wild Jam #80.
All art, design, and code created from scratch during the event.

title: Daycart Isle
short_description: A small game created over 72 hours in a team of 2 for GMTK Game Jam
description: A small island to explore using the ability to arbitrarily scale any pickupable object.
Created over 72 hours in a team of 2 for GMTK Game Jam.

title: To The Lake
short_description: A small 2D RPG created in a team of 2 for Godot Wild Jam #70
description: A small 2D RPG game created in Godot Engine.
Developed over 8 days in a team of 2 for Godot Wild Jam #70.
All art, design, and code created from scratch during the event.

title: Tower Defense Game
short_description: A basic tower defense game created with LibGDX
description: A basic tower defense game writen from scratch using the LibGDX graphics library in Java.

title: Enemy Avoider Game
short_description: An ncurses-based enemy avoider game created over 24 hours for the HackCU 2019 hackathon
description: A basic enemy avoider game in the command line developed using Ncurses with C++.
Created over 24 hours for the HackCU 2019 hackathon in order to learn the challenges and conepts important to designing a game engine.
